sense.def:
Kadar je odnos med dvema stvarema ali količinama
inverse
, se pri njem ena povečuje, ko se druga zmanjšuje.

seg.quote: The time spent varies in inverse proportion to the amount of work done.

sense.def:
The inverse of something
je natančno nasprotje nečesa.

seg.quote: It represents the inverse of everything I find worth preserving.
The inverse case is also worth considering.
